In addition to collecting on a life insurance policy, Riley will make sure that Allan never writes for another publisher.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Beginning with a look at the early use of wind and water power, Fred traces the development of the steam engine and visits a man who has built a windmill in his own back garden. He then sets off in search of early beam engines that are still functioning today.

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: How do you organise a rail network in a country made up of separate local time zones, and no recognised timetables? Before the railways our country was divided, local time was proudly treasured. Clocks in the west of the country were several minutes behind those set in the east. The railways wanted the country to step to a new beat in a world of precise schedules and timetables that recognised Greenwich Meantime. Some complained about the new world of one single time zone and precise schedules.

programme.title: Britains Lost Masterpieces
programme.desc: Pollok House is a country house right in the middle of a Glasgow city park, bordered on one side by the M77 and on the other side by the south side of Glasgow. It is owned by Glasgow City Council and looked after by the National Trust for Scotland.

programme.title: Call My Bluff
programme.desc: Robert Robinson presides as Frank Muir, Sue Cook and Bryan Forbes take on Arthur Marshall, Nanette Newman, Paul Eddington in a duel of words and wit.

programme.title: Face the Music

programme.title: Arena
programme.desc: First of a two-part film profile of Orson Welles, looking at his life and career in theatre, radio and particularly film. With Jeanne Moreau, John Huston, Peter Bogdanovitch, Robert Wise, Charlton Heston, and a detailed interview with Welles himself. This part deals with his work up to `Touch of Evil.

programme.title: Arena
programme.desc: Second of a two-part profile of Orson Welles, looking at films including `The Trial, Chimes at Midnight, The Immortal Story and F for Fake and discussing his many unfinished projects, including `The Other Side of the Wind and `Don Quixote.

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It
programme.desc: Mark Wright and his team, Karla Pryce and Asher Edwards, step in to help Glorias family, whose home was devastated by a flood. A year later, their living room is still a dumping ground, and the kitchen is chaotic. With clever decluttering, custom storage solutions and a vibrant feature wall, the team transform the house into a warm, functional space. From a playful coffee table to ingenious kitchen storage, they bring joy, style and order back to Glorias home.

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Best pals Amanda and Alan take on their first major renovation project, transforming the old dining room into a Tuscan living room. Failing to reach agreement on the colour scheme, the two venture off to try and get some inspiration from the colourful fishing village of Riomaggiore. Colour choice becomes the least of their worries though, when they discover the windows of their 17th-century home are unsalvageable and must be made from scratch.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jules Hudson is in his element as he explores the glorious countryside of North and West Yorkshire with a couple from a market town in West Sussex. programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Watch King Alfred the Great argue with his older brothers, then defeat the Vikings using his cunning hit-and-run tactics, summoning the spirit of Ed Sheeran. Meanwhile, across the world and Ant and Dec host a very special Chinese edition of Im A Celebrity.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: A special episode about the great French leader Napoleon Bonaparte, starring Jim Howick. Following Napoleon as he rises from humble beginnings to be the Emperor of France, bashing most of Europe along the way, and ultimately meeting his Waterloo at, well, Waterloo!

programme.title: The Catch-Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The boys attempt to find a trio of cars which are equally at home on the race track as they are at transporting a family to the shops, all for a budget of £5,000. Plus, James makes a rare visit to the `Top Gear track to test a pair of Porsches, the 911 Sport Classic and Boxster Spyder, while Alastair Campbell is the star in the all new Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: Stranded On Honeymoon Island: Australia
programme.desc: Deep in the Pacific Ocean, a string of islands is the staging ground for the wildest ever dating experience. Six couples - Brie and Byron, Amy and Mike and Georgia and Chad - have been matched at a specially designed speed dating event and will now marry and spend the next 21 days stranded on Honeymoon Island, away from everyone and everything they know.

programme.title: Stranded On Honeymoon Island: Australia
programme.desc: While Georgia and Chad and Brie and Byrons relationships are full of chemistry and attraction, the only thing simmering for Amy and Mike is tension. But theres always hope because three new couples tie the knot and are whisked away to Honeymoon Island. Romance is in the air as relationships blossom before a reality check puts on the brakes for one couple. Mysterious crates wash up on the island, revealing insights into the couples past, which means a better understanding of their partners.

programme.title: Stranded On Honeymoon Island: Australia
programme.desc: Sparks are set to fly as the newlyweds prepare for the first Couples Cove.

programme.title: Bad Influencer: The Great Insta Con
programme.desc: The shocking story of the rise and fall of one of Instagrams first super-influencers. By 23, Australian wellness guru Belle Gibson had cultivated an adoring global following online with the story that she had successfully treated her own terminal cancer by eating a plant-based diet and using alternative natural therapies. But there was one problem with Belles story: she had never had cancer.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy doesnt want to see Jamma anymore, so when Jamma meets a magical stranger who offers to unburden him from his clownish ways to win Guy back, he decides to take the deal and is transformed. Guy has a photoshoot for his book cover, but he doesnt want to look boring, so Isaac offers to style him in exchange for free therapy.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: The new Jamma is reliable and consistent - he wants to respect Guys boundaries, but he also needs Saifs address from Guy so that he can try and reconnect with his dad. Guy is pleasantly surprised by the new and improved Jamma. Winnies dad is visiting for some quality father-daughter bonding, but shes not yet come out as straight to him and asks Isaac to play along.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy retraces Sarms last known movements before her disappearance from a charter yacht in 2021. She hears Sarms boyfriend, Ryan Bane, give his account of what happened through his lawyer.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir meets with island police and is given CCTV footage that has never been released, showing Sarms last known movements with her boyfriend, Ryan Bane.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir searches for the yacht Sarm vanished from and tracks down Ryan Banes ex-wife, hearing first-hand about her experiences while married to him.

programme.title: People Just Do Nothing: Big in Japan
programme.desc: Since the end of their pirate radio station, life has been quiet for the Kurupt FM boys, but everything is about to change. News reaches them that one of their songs has been used on a popular game show in Japan. Theyve made it. Their music is reaching hundreds of thousands of people. Its finally time for them to enjoy the fame and fortune that theyve always known they deserved.

programme.title: Bad Influencer: The Great Insta Con
programme.desc: The shocking story of the rise and fall of one of Instagrams first super-influencers. By 23, Australian wellness guru Belle Gibson had cultivated an adoring global following online with the story that she had successfully treated her own terminal cancer by eating a plant-based diet and using alternative natural therapies. But there was one problem with Belles story: she had never had cancer.

Finally, Mrs Bailey, Leon and Ottilie clean out the guinea pig hutch, but will all the wood shavings make it into the hutch or end up on Ottilie?

programme.desc: Simon and Evie take Waffle for a walk and bump into Evies friend Anaya and her mum, AJ. An overenthusiastic Waffle drags Simon through the park, soaking him under a sprinkler.

programme.title: Topsy and Tim
programme.desc: Its the morning of Topsy and Tims first day at school. Topsy is excited but Tim has a funny tummy. Tim feels better when Topsy reminds him that theyve got a fun promise to keep: they must wave to Mr Rosen from the railway bridge on their journey to school.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa and all his friends are finding out about different animals. Raa Raa wants a partner to dance a noisy stompy dance with. All the animals have their own way of dancing, apart from Zebby who says she is too shy to dance, or is she?

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.sub-title: All It Takes is a Pinch of Coverage
programme.desc: The Catchers land on the construction planet where they meet alien children Beech, Pine, and Palm.

programme.title: Octonauts: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: The Octonauts expand their exploration beyond the sea - and onto land. With new rides and new friends, they are prepared to protect any habitats and animals at risk on land or under the water.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: A strange find far away from the ship breaks DORISs satnav. Luckily, Big Lizards on hand to teach Cosima how to find her way around without technology.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Supertato is due to receive the Best Hero Award, but Evil Pea decides she should get it. Carrot tells her she needs to defeat herself to win the award.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Norrie is sick. Squirrels think of something to cheer her up, Happy suggests a get well soon card!

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Lying Fox
programme.desc: When Mr Tod is trapped in Mr McGregors garden, Peter reluctantly agrees to help him escape, but soon learns that you should never trust a fox.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: As the children arrive, there is a rainbow over the school. Mrs Farrell points it out to Bryn before they head inside to create their own rainbow on the carpet. The rainbow has disappeared and the rain has stopped, so some of the children go outside for a game of hide-and-seek in the forest area. They soon find a hammock and take it in turns to try it out whilst the others sing a nursery rhyme. Back inside, its time for some more nursery rhymes with music teacher Miss Usher.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: When a lost bird takes a liking to Bo, it is up to Mojo to fly it to its home. But its a stormy trip, and Bo will need to do some flying of his own!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Luckys Dads pie.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Its time for Bluey and Bingo to get out of the bath. But Dad has decided not to tell them what to do and gets roped into a game of Burger Shop.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: Nervous about public speaking, Looph builds a robot to deliver a science talk in her place, but her Piripenguin friends are determined to help her do it herself.

programme.title: Dodges Pup School
programme.desc: Following Dodge at Pup School, a place full of mishaps and mayhem. Dodge and his pup pals turn school days into adventures with singing, silliness, and occasional squeaky toys.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: Evies mum, Jess, has just married Dougs dad, Simon. The new family get home to discover a lost puppy hiding in their wedding presents. Evie wants to keep him and call him Waffle.

programme.title: Puffin Rock
programme.desc: Double act Phoenix and Mossy are on their way to meet Oona when they find Spiky the hedgehog near the Bat Cave. Hes far away from his burrows, and its getting late. Poor wee fella - hes so small and helpless... they cant leave him on his own. They decide to take him home, but on their way to the Meadow, the friends learn not to judge a book by its very cute cover.

programme.title: JoJo and Gran Gran
programme.sub-title: Autumn: Its Time to Go Beachcombing
programme.desc: When JoJo and Gran Gran visit the beach, JoJo is surprised to find the sea isnt there anymore. Gran Gran explains that the sea is there, but its just further away as the tide it out, making it the perfect time to go beachcombing. Together, they see what interesting things they can find. JoJo learns all about fossils, as well as the people in the past who helped discover ones that are millions of years old, hidden within the beach. JoJo even finds a few special things of her own.

programme.title: Moon and Me

programme.title: The Clangers
programme.desc: The Music Tree notes for Tiny Clangers marvellous new melody are blown away when a big wind blows across the planet. No one can find them. But Tiny hears Mother Clanger whistling a tune while she gardens. Its Tinys tune - and she heard it coming from high in the sky!

programme.desc: Unable to pay her share of rent and utilities, the guys tell Jess to get a job.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mike feels let down when his daughters arent into celebrating Halloween with him the way they used to.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: When Mandy wants to enter a contest to be on a TV modelling show, Mike intends to give her his usual yes as he does with all of his daughters requests, knowing that Vanessa will tell her no.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: After her Tupperware party is ruined, Debra decides shes had enough of her interfering mother-in-law.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Rays wish list for Christmas includes a little romance with Debra, but she proves to be a difficult gift to unwrap.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Raymond joins his brother and Frank in a Gettysburg Civil War re-enactment in an attempt to bond with his father.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray is excited about meeting a distant relative, until she begins to overstay her welcome.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross learns that a pregnant Rachel wants to move out and find a place of her own, so he suggests a vacancy in his building. Then he learns that the elderly occupant is not quite dead yet. Meanwhile, Phoebe is ecstatic when Eric dumps her twin sister Ursula and chooses her instead, and Monica comes unhinged when she suspects that her new maid is stealing her jeans, among other things.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Feeling guilty for denying Chandler a bachelor party, Monica hires a stripper to perform for him, without learning that shes a prostitute. Elsewhere, Rachels father learns about her pregnancy and plans to give Ross a piece of his mind.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: An old high-school friend of Monicas is invited to the Thanksgiving dinner with the gang, but Monica is unaware that he isnt exactly fond of Rachel. Meanwhile, Chandler and Phoebe pretend to be mesmerised by American football in order to avoid helping Monica in the kitchen, and Joey vows to devour the entire turkey single-handedly.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler is aghast when Monica buys painfully expensive boots, and Phoebe tries to capitalise on her discovery that Ross son attends school with the son of rock star Sting.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Ross Step Forward
programme.desc: Ross new girlfriend wants to put their photograph on Christmas cards, Rachel eyes Joey as a possible romantic partner, and the newlyweds cope with Chandlers boss as he goes through a divorce.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Dates Rachel
programme.desc: To prepare Joey for his big date the following night, Rachel eagerly agrees to go out with him for a rare night on the town. However, when each is pleasantly surprised with their newfound compatibility, they begin to regard each other in a way that no one could have predicted.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Takes a Bath
programme.desc: As Joey agonises over his secret affection for Rachel, Monica mistakenly thinks that he is infatuated with Phoebe. Meanwhile, Ross and Rachel promise not to try to find out the sex of their unborn child, but Rachel cant resist having a peek inside the doctors confidential folder. Also, Monica urges a reluctant Chandler to enjoy the soothing pleasures of a scented bath, but realises that shes created a tub monster.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Secret Closet
programme.desc: Joey rushes pregnant Rachel to hospital when she experiences pains. When Ross feels left out, Joey makes a gallant suggestion. Meanwhile, Chandler is surprised to discover what is behind the locked door of Monicas secret cupboard, and Phoebe gets the impression that Monica is enjoying one of her massages a little too much.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Birthing Video
programme.desc: Monica prepares for a sexy Valentines Day, but Chandler is too shell-shocked after accidentally viewing Rachels birthing video. Meanwhile, Phoebe gives Joey the worlds most cheerful dog.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Tells Rachel
programme.desc: A guilt-ridden Joey finally confesses his love for Rachel to the flabbergasted Ross, while Chandler becomes nervous when Phoebes handsome new boyfriend Don shares numerous personality traits with Monica.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Tea Leaves
programme.desc: In an effort to restore normality to their friendship, Rachel tells Joey a big lie about her unborn child. Meanwhile, Phoebes tea leaves reveal that she will soon encounter the man of her dreams.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe brings her annoyingly upbeat boyfriend to Mr and Mrs Gellers 35th wedding anniversary party. Meanwhile, Ross is astounded when his parents ask him and the pregnant Rachel to pretend to be married, in order to avoid a potential scandal.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey is thrilled when his name is used in a `Soap Opera Digest crossword puzzle. He is reluctant to let the magazine do a profile of him, but Rachel tries to persuade him to reconsider so that he can mention her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Baby Shower
programme.desc: Rachel panics when she realises how unprepared she is to care for an infant. She reluctantly agrees to allow her frustrating mother Sandra to move in to help her, upsetting Ross. Meanwhile, Monica tries to atone for forgetting to invite Sandra to the baby shower, and Chandler and Ross exhaust themselves by repeatedly playing a confusing game called Bamboozle to help Joey prepare to audition as a game show host.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Cooking Class
programme.desc: When Monicas cooking at the restaurant receives a harsh write-up in a newspaper, she goes to a criticism class taught by the reviewer, hoping to convince him to reconsider his opinion. Meanwhile, Rachel gets upset when a cute salesgirl flirts with Ross while he and Rachel are shopping for baby supplies, and nervous about a major job interview, Chandler receives some questionable coaching from Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel Is Late
programme.desc: When Rachels pregnancy goes beyond the expected delivery date, the pain makes her increasingly irritable and willing to try anything that might speed up the babys arrival. Meanwhile, Monica and Phoebe bet on the date of the birth, while Joey can only take one guest to the premiere of his film, and chooses Chandler. Unfortunately, Chandler falls asleep during the screening.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Tom Allen, Desiree Burch and Vicky Pattison
programme.desc: ...Internet. Host Iain Stirling is joined by Tom Allen, Desiree Burch and Vicky Pattison for a savage scroll through the most absurd corners of the internet, from Gen Z to dodgy travel trends. (S1, E05)

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: For the penultimate leg of their journey Bradley and Barney head to Italy, starting by the picturesque Lake Garda, where Barney surprises his dad by explaining they will be running off the top of Monte Baldo and paragliding over the lake below. Soon after, Bradley takes a dip in the lake when he tries paddleboard yoga. The next day the guys travel to the River Po for a boat trip like no other, as Bradley is treated to a hair-raising ride in a Formula 1 speed boat.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Barney and Bradley Walsh embark on the final leg of their European road trip, as they continue to explore Italy. Having reached Rome, they take a trip back in time to battle it out as gladiators. They continue south and make a stop to soak up the views from a sky high zipwire. As the boys reach their final stop on the Amalfi Coast, they get the chance to swim in the stunning sea, but theyll have to cliff dive in first.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Aisha introduces a series of brilliant clips from the last decade, incl. sexy farmers in Scenes From A Hat, and star guest Danielle Panabaker on a date at a Tom Cruise themed restaurant.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Guest comedian Rachel Bloom.

programme.title: Important Things With Demetri Martin
programme.desc: Demetri focuses his attention on the idea of strategy including jokes about taking a second helping of food, seduction techniques and a sketch including Sherlock Holmes.

programme.title: Mike Judges Beavis and Butt-Head
programme.desc: Van Driessen is badly injured in the woods, and only Beavis and Butt-Head can rescue him. After a wild night out, Middle-aged Beavis wakes up with a tattoo he does not remember getting.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The off-colour adventures of four elementary school boys.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle just wants to play video games with his little brother, Ike, but when Ike doesnt want to play with him anymore, Kyle is afraid that the next generation is passing him by.

programme.title: Beavis and Butt-head
programme.desc: Beavis and Butt-head become a garage band. After smashing VDs guitar they head to the motel to get a gig, but a communication breakdown could cause the band to dissolve before their first concert.

programme.title: Utopia
programme.desc: Nat handles a Freedom of Information request.

programme.title: Utopia
programme.desc: Tony gets a request from Jim; Rhonda nominates Nat to be a conference keynote speaker.

programme.title: Ed Byrne: Spoiler Alert
programme.desc: `Mock the Week star and Munro bagger Ed Byrne performs his Edinburgh Fringe sell-out stand-up show Spoiler Alert at Glasgows Tramway. In the show, Ed explores the thin line between righteous complaining and brat-like whining and asks, `are we right to be fed up, or are we spoiled? Ed is always happy to perform in Glasgow, where he took his fledgling comedy steps while at university.

programme.title: Ancient Egypt by Train
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts arrives in Cairo by train carrying a book she first read as a youth, `A Thousand Miles Up The Nile by Victorian Egyptologist Amelia Edwards. Alice follows Edwards footsteps to the Great Pyramids and is allowed to climb deep inside to see the tomb and sarcophagus of the pharaoh Khufu.

programme.desc: As staff and patients come to terms with Whitney Houstons death, Kings is filling up with young people who were having fun with their friends when disaster struck. programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Nonagenarian Ernest was walking to get his pension when he was hit by a vehicle while crossing the road. Hes rushed straight to resus, conscious but with injuries to his head and pelvis. On the same day, octogenarian Williams finger is mangled and bleeding after he caught it on a machine at his metal working business. Later, 80-year-old Joyce and her son Kevin, who has learning difficulties, arrive after he collapses.

programme.desc: A recently paroled master thief assumes the identity of Lucas Hood, sheriff-in-waiting of Banshee, Pa.

programme.desc: Unexpected visitors arrive in Moles Town. Littlefingers motives are questioned.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jon Snow and the Nights Watch face a big challenge.

programme.title: Succession

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Paul looks at the issues that have fueled Jake and Amys relationship.

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Competition is fierce as local merchant Robert and wife Kelly open up a fish and chip restaurant. Plus, follow the journey of the turbot as it goes from sea to the dinner plate.

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming heads across the Irish Sea to Dublin where he succumbs to the citys famous charm, shares a pint with Sharon Corr and unlocks a mystery in Irelands oldest library.

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: Richard E Grant looks at the secrets of hotels.

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky calls in a favour; Owen Sleater intervenes on a delivery intended for a struggling casino operator; dinner guests clash at Babettes; Lucy frets about her loneliness.

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky considers a risky legal manoeuvre; Jimmy and Mickey head to Philadelphia; Eli worries about the Commodores ability to lead; Chalky is cornered at work and at home; Van Aldens agents target Mickeys warehouse; Richard lets down his guard.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Strickland tracks down the sergeant originally assigned to the Dodson case while Mason and Della run a solemn errand up north. Della sets out to find Mrs. Dodson more capable legal representation.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: A damning witness testimony begins Emilys trial. Della and Strickland investigate a potential connection between Detective Ennis and Charlies kidnappers, and Mason considers betraying Drakes trust.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion welcomes a guest, Jon Snow is not welcome at Castle Black, Arya encounters an old friend.

programme.title: Das Boot
programme.desc: Schulz kills again. Klaus Hoffmann has to realize that the Allied invasion is already underway. In Naples, a man with a murder mission is waiting.

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky introduces a surprise guest speaker at a dedication for war veterans; Eli questions his allegiances; Nucky gets a new lawyer; Jimmy learns a lesson; Richard goes hunting.

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire
programme.desc: Nucky arranges a risky liquor delivery; complications arise in Nuckys federal case; Jimmy finds a new mentor; Margaret makes a confession; Lucy struggles in solitude; Van Alden wrestles with his conscience.

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: A sniper holds the city hostage and leaves the police clues; Russert is demoted for mishandling a news conference; guest Jay Leno.

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: The squad have a suspect - a witness who is always at the scene of the crime - but have difficulty proving his guilt.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Laws of Gods and Men
programme.desc: Stannis and Davos set sail, Dany meets with supplicants and Tyrion faces down his father.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion gains an unlikely ally, Daario asks Dany to allow him to do what he does best, Jons warnings about the vulnerability of the Wall are ignored, and Brienne follows a new lead.

programme.title: Mare of Easttown
programme.desc: With Mare forced to take a backseat on the case, Colin presses a local priest about the vague circumstances that prompted his transfer to the parish; an anonymous call gives Dawn hope that Katie might still be alive.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Jackie Jr decides its time to make a move in organised crime, and Carmela confides in a priest.

programme.title: The Wire

programme.title: Banshee

programme.title: Game of Thrones

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jon Snow and the Nights Watch face a big challenge.

programme.title: Fast and Furious 7
programme.desc: After defeating international terrorist Owen Shaw, Dominic Toretto, Brian OConner and the rest of the crew have separated to return to more normal lives. However, Deckard Shaw, Owens older brother, is thirsty for revenge. A slick government agent offers to help Dom and company take care of Shaw in exchange for their help in rescuing a kidnapped computer hacker who has developed a powerful surveillance program.

programme.title: Fast and Furious 8
programme.desc: The globetrotting crew faces an unexpected challenge when a mysterious woman named Cipher forces Dom to betray them all. Now, they must unite to bring home the man who made them a family and stop her from unleashing chaos on a grand scale.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: A Mexican village is at the mercy of Calvera, the leader of a band of outlaws. The townspeople, too afraid to fight for themselves, hire seven American gunslingers to free them from the bandits raids. The professional gunmen train the villagers to defend themselves, then plan a trap for the evil Calvera.

programme.title: SAS: Red Notice
programme.desc: A grooms wedding plans are disrupted when a small army of well-trained criminals, led by Laszlo Antonov, hijack the Eurostar deep beneath the English Channel.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Comic-book adventure about a stunt motorcyclist tricked into making a pact with Mephistopheles. The rider can only escape doing the demons bidding if he agrees to battle the dark lords son. To this end, he assumes the identity of the supernatural Ghost Rider, a terrifying night-time vigilante with a flaming skull.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A widowed farmer, with a brave but brutal military past, decides not to join up when the British arrive in 1776. However, when his son enlists and is later captured by the enemy, the former soldier must abandon his new-found pacifist principles in order to rescue his oldest child, and forms a regiment of Carolina patriots, whose guerrilla tactics prove pivotal to the US war effort.

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Brixton Lorr is a cybernetically enhanced soldier who possesses superhuman strength, a brilliant mind and a lethal pathogen that could wipe out half of the worlds population. Its now up to hulking lawman Luke Hobbs and lawless operative Deckard Shaw to put aside their past differences and work together to prevent the seemingly indestructible Lorr from destroying humanity.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An ex-hit man is injected with a mysterious cocktail of drugs by his arch-rival that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. Hurtling through a succession of sex and violence in order to keep his pulse rate up, he must seek revenge and keep himself and his girlfriend alive.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: After reuniting with his long-lost father, Po must train a village of clumsy pandas to help him defeat a supernatural warrior who becomes stronger with each battle.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
programme.desc: When a powerful shape-shifting sorceress sets her eyes on Pos Staff of Wisdom, he suddenly realises hes going to need some help. Teaming up with a quick-witted corsac fox, he soon discovers that heroes can be found in the most unexpected places.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Po might just be the laziest, clumsiest panda in the Valley of Peace, but he secretly dreams of becoming a kung fu legend. When the villainous snow leopard Tai Lung threatens Pos homeland, the hapless panda is chosen to fulfil an ancient prophecy and defend the Valley from attack. Training under Master Shifu, Po embarks on an epic high-kicking adventure as he sets out to thwart Tai Lungs evil plans. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po must unlock secrets of his past in order to defeat a formidable villain who plans to wipe out kung fu and conquer China. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: Young DJ and his pals set out to discover what bloodcurdling secrets lie behind the front door of the scary house across the street. When the house comes alive and starts eating people, have the kids bitten off more than they can chew?

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: Looking for the days when he felt like a `real ogre, shrek makes an ill advised pact with Rumpelstiltskin. Banished to a Shrek-less version of the land of Far Far Away, the unfortunate ogre must once again win the love of Princess Fiona if hes to ever get back home.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: Three emojis embark on an epic adventure through a smartphone to save their world from being deleted.

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Stranded in the wilderness, a mule deer and a domesticated bear try to make their way back to the safety of a town preserve before a hunter catches them.

programme.title: Open Season 2
programme.desc: Elliots way to his wedding with Giselle gets longer when Mr Weenie is kidnapped by a group of pampered pets determined to return him to his owners.

programme.title: Open Season 3
programme.desc: After Boog switches places with a circus bear, Elliott and the gang must rescue him before the circus returns home to Russia.

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Angelo, an aspiring explorer, is left behind by his distracted parents at a rest stop. He then ventures into a forest inhabited by strange, wonderful creatures to find them.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Animal Instincts
programme.desc: When the beast-themed Animilitia plague Gotham, Batman swings out to investigate. But with The Penguin and his cyber-animals added to the mix, Batman will need the help of Green Arrow and The Flash to bring them to heel.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Mechs vs. Mutants
programme.desc: Gotham City faces catastrophe when Mr Freeze transforms Killer Croc and Bane into mega-sized mutant monsters. As the gigantic villains go on the rampage, its up to the caped crusader to cut them down to size.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem
programme.desc: The Dark Knight assembles his heroic friends like Green Arrow and Nightwing to stop the Joker and his cronies from unleashing a diabolical computer virus.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: The Book of Clarence
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck man struggles to find a better life for his family while fighting to free himself of debt. Captivated by the power and glory of the rising Messiah, he risks everything to carve his own path to a divine life.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Borat Subsequent Moviefilm
programme.desc: Released from prison for bringing shame to his country, Kazakh funnyman Borat risks life and limb when he returns to America with his 15-year-old daughter.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: The Accidental Husband
programme.desc: Emma Lloyd is a successful woman. She has a hit radio talk show, an impending book deal, and a loving relationship with her fiance, Richard. However, everything changes when Emma finds out that she is already married to a man she has never met before.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydias life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuices name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: The Death of Stalin
programme.desc: When dictator Joseph Stalin dies, his parasitic cronies square off in a frantic power struggle to become the next Soviet leader. As they bumble, brawl and back-stab their way to the top, the question remains -- just who is running the government?

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Five Easy Pieces
programme.desc: A once-talented pianist rejects his promising career to live a relaxed, blue-collar life as an oil rigger. On discovering that his father is ill some years later, he reluctantly returns home, only to find that he no longer fits in with either his artistic family or his working-class friends.

programme.title: A Different Man
programme.desc: An aspiring actor undergoes a radical medical procedure to drastically transform his appearance. However, his new dream face quickly turns into a nightmare as he becomes obsessed with reclaiming what was lost.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Rent
programme.desc: Artists, junkies and misfits in New Yorks East Village struggle with poverty, illness and the Aids epidemic.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: A Different Man
programme.desc: An aspiring actor undergoes a radical medical procedure to drastically transform his appearance. However, his new dream face quickly turns into a nightmare as he becomes obsessed with reclaiming what was lost.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Einar Wegener travels to Germany to undergo one of the first sex-change operations that took place over the course of 2 years.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother. Movie adaptation of the musical, set to Abbas greatest hits.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a group of Allied POWs who engineered a bold escape from a Nazi camp during World War II. The escape committees plan is to liberate hundreds of inmates and cause havoc throughout occupied territory, but their problems include concealing three tunnels from the guards and disposing of numerous tons of soil.

programme.title: The Great Escape

The escape committees plan is to liberate hundreds of inmates and cause havoc throughout occupied territory, but their problems include concealing three tunnels from the guards and disposing of numerous tons of soil.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college leavers Fred and Barney decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends, Wilma and Betty. Fred, however, has a rival for the affections of his classy girlfriend Wilma - the wealthy playboy Chip Rockefeller.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four unlikely warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April ONeil to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A junior high-school student and his best friend play a series of pranks on the sleazy Hollywood producer responsible for plagiarising his class essay and turning it into a hit film.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Spoof spy caper with the eponymous, blundering hero attempting to recover the crown jewels and save Britain from an evil mastermind when all the other agents are killed. Promoted from lowly pen pusher to super spy, Johnny English is baffled when clues lead to respected entrepreneur Pascal Sauvage, but could the enigmatic Lorna hold the key to the mystery?

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A haphazard spy returns to MI-7 after years in a Tibetan monastery honing his zen skills. Armed with gizmos, gadgets and chaotic luck he takes on a global ring of assassins.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Constance Bonacieux is kidnapped before DArtagnans very eyes. In a frantic quest to save her, the young musketeer, aided by Athos, Porthos and Aramis, is forced to join forces with the mysterious Milady de Winter.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: I Used to Be Funny
programme.desc: Comedian Sam struggles with PTSD, and considers joining the search for a missing teenage girl.

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two high-school nerds accidentally create the woman of their dreams when an electrical storm zaps their home computer.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: A pair of idiotic friends set off on a madcap journey to return a briefcase to its owner. However, they are blissfully unaware that the case contains a large amount of ransom money for the owners kidnapped husband. Their trip is soon fraught with disaster, especially when the kidnappers begin to pursue them across the country with the aim of grabbing the cash.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: Matilda is a gifted child, more gifted than any other, but her parents wont let her go to school. She teaches herself for years by going to the library and reading everything she sees. Eventually she convinces her parents to let her go to school, but discovers her special talents are needed to protect the school and her lovely teacher from the evil headmistress.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking
programme.desc: Mollie is a pregnant woman whose partner has deserted her. When she goes into labour, friendly taxi driver James rushes her to hospital and the pair become firm friends. He slowly falls in love with her and her baby Mikey, but shes still looking for her perfect partner, not realising hes right under her nose. However we can hear Mikeys thoughts, and he wants James as his Dad.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: Montgomery Brewster is a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300 million. However, theres a catch: he has to waste $30 million in just 30 days without anyone knowing hes doing it.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Danny is sour after driving away his girlfriend, and Wheeler is into anything wearing a skirt. The two get into a fight with a trucker and choose community service over a jail term.

programme.title: Role Models

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Antz
programme.desc: Visually exuberant tale about a neurotic ant who struggles to express his individuality in a colony of conformists. He attempts to break from his totalitarian society while at the same time trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: Aeon lives in a world restricted to the last city on Earth, after a plague has destroyed the rest of the world. The city is ruled by a council and its chairman, and people are mysteriously disappearing. Aeon is an assassin for an underground group of rebels called the Monicans, and is assigned to remove the Chairman, but at the last minute she finds herself unable to do it.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken. Two rebels on the run may be able to restore order.

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: Charlies PI company is approached by Eric Knox, owner of Knox Technologies, whose revolutionary voice-recognition software has been stolen. Angels Natalie, Dylan and Alex are sent to place a bug in the system of bitter rival Roger Corwin, who is under strong suspicion, but after the deed is done, the Angels and their sidekick Bosley face the fact of a destroyed home base as well as Charlies life in immediate danger.

programme.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The girls are on the hunt for two gold rings that hold the new identities of every single person who has entered the FBIs Witness Protection Program. When some of them turn up dead, the race is on to find the perpetrators, while using their cunning, guile, martial arts and amazing outfits to get what they want.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his familys killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: When Set, the Egyptian god of darkness, manages to ascend to the throne of the Egyptian empire. Mortal Bek and the God of the sky Horus join together to save the world and Beks love.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: Aeon lives in a world restricted to the last city on Earth, after a plague has destroyed the rest of the world. The city is ruled by a council and its chairman, and people are mysteriously disappearing. Aeon is an assassin for an underground group of rebels called the Monicans, and is assigned to remove the Chairman, but at the last minute she finds herself unable to do it.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken. Two rebels on the run may be able to restore order.

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: Charlies PI company is approached by Eric Knox, owner of Knox Technologies, whose revolutionary voice-recognition software has been stolen. Angels Natalie, Dylan and Alex are sent to place a bug in the system of bitter rival Roger Corwin, who is under strong suspicion, but after the deed is done, the Angels and their sidekick Bosley face the fact of a destroyed home base as well as Charlies life in immediate danger.

programme.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The girls are on the hunt for two gold rings that hold the new identities of every single person who has entered the FBIs Witness Protection Program. When some of them turn up dead, the race is on to find the perpetrators, while using their cunning, guile, martial arts and amazing outfits to get what they want.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his familys killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: When Set, the Egyptian god of darkness, manages to ascend to the throne of the Egyptian empire. Mortal Bek and the God of the sky Horus join together to save the world and Beks love.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Repo Man
programme.desc: Bud is a repo man - his job is to hunt down and re-possess cars on which the owners payment is overdue. Sometimes dirty, sometimes dangerous, usually drug-fuelled, he takes on Otto Maddox as an apprentice and starts teaching him the tricks of the trade. Then the call for the big job goes out - $20,000 to the first to track down a 1964 Chevy Malibu. Suddenly every repo man in the city is on the case - as are government agents.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: Hapless Agnes repeatedly falls for the wrong guy, dies a grim death, and is reincarnated a century later. As she experiences romantic misfortune through different eras of history, Agnes seeks to avoid repeat mistakes and finally break the cycle.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Watched
programme.desc: A 28-year-old artist gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. Finding shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers who are stalked by mysterious creatures every night.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: Bank clerk Freddie graduates from collecting butterflies to collecting girls. Only one girl can match wits with him. This quietly chilling film is based on the novel by John Fowles.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Woman in Black 2: Angel of Death
programme.desc: 40 years after Eel Marsh Houses first haunting, a group of children and a schoolteacher take refuge at the house, escaping from WWII London. There they will awaken the houses darkest inhabitant.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Live Die Repeat: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A soldier who was killed in action gets caught up in a time loop, in which he repeatedly relives his last battle. However, the more times he fights, the closer he gets to discovering how to defeat the alien enemy.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Abigail
programme.desc: A group of would-be criminals kidnaps the 12-year-old daughter of a powerful underworld figure. Holding her for ransom in an isolated mansion, their plan starts to unravel when they discover their young captive is actually a bloodthirsty vampire.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: MaXXXine
programme.desc: In 1980s Hollywood, adult film star and aspiring actress Maxine Minx finally gets her big break. However, as a mysterious killer stalks the starlets of Los Angeles, a trail of blood threatens to reveal her sinister past.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Cuckoo
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Gretchen reluctantly leaves America to live with her father at a resort in the German Alps. Plagued by strange noises and bloody visions, she soon discovers a shocking secret that concerns her own family.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Curtis and his family are selected to test a revolutionary new device called AIA that takes smart homes to the next level. As AIA begins to learn everyones behaviour and anticipate their needs, it makes sure nothing and no one gets in their way.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: Visually arresting thriller about a researcher who uses a mentally disabled gardener for ill-advised experiments in inducing mental development through virtual reality simulations. At first, the simulations seem to enhance the lawnmower mans mental powers, but then the experiment goes haywire. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.title: The Bricklayer
programme.desc: A rogue insurgent assassinates foreign journalists and makes it look like the CIA is responsible. Coaxed out of retirement to clear the agencys name, a deadly operative must confront his checkered past while unraveling an international conspiracy.

programme.title: Murder In The Valleys
programme.desc: A new suspect emerges and with his chequered past, the police are convinced theyve got their man. But the community isnt so sure.

programme.title: True Crime Story: Citizen Detective
programme.desc: A young man leaves home for the corner store but dies on a rainy pavement just down the street. While bystanders claim that he fell off his bike, his mum and sister do not buy it and hit the streets to find answers.

programme.title: Facing Evil
programme.desc: It took police 10 years to unravel a convoluted murder-for-hire plot involving three junkies and a callous hit man, which resulted in a life imprisonment sentence.

programme.title: Facing Evil
programme.desc: Tyra Whitney killed her daughter Tashiras boyfriend, LeMarcus Bell,with a hammer. LeMarcus died from his injuries shortly, and Tyra faced incarceration.

programme.title: Facing Evil
programme.desc: Sylvilla Humphrey shot her friend, Ercell Minix in the neck, at the beauty salon where she worked. The victims son, 5 at the time, is now NBA star Kendrick Perkins.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Murder She Solved
programme.desc: Female investigators open up about some of the biggest cases they have cracked, beginning with a decade-long investigation into the death of a young woman.

programme.title: Murder She Solved
programme.desc: When 52-year-old nurse Mindy Schloss vanished from her home, it fell to dedicated detective Pam Perrenoud to bring her cruel killer to justice.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A Brooklyn woman turns to a N.Y. private eye for help tracking down a Russian beauty she believes robbed and killed her mother. Can they find her? Peter Van Sant investigates.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a state trooper is attacked, investigators uncover a `signature that links the assault to the murder of a young woman.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a woman vanishes under mysterious circumstances, investigators use cat hairs and insects to track her down.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Blood spatter analysis and an investigation lead police to the truth when a pregnant woman is found dead in her home.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A mother is determined to discover what happened when her daughter is injured in a hit and run accident.

programme.title: Murder UK With Martin Kemp
programme.desc: Martin Kemp examines the case of Frederick and Rosemary West, a married couple who killed at least ten young British girls, many at their home in Gloucestershire.

programme.title: Morbidelli Rising
programme.desc: Theres danger on the track at the years biggest race, Mugello. Franco battles to focus on his goal of Rookie of the Year while around him his team implodes.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: 48 Hours goes behind the scenes with investigators as they search for a mother of two who vanished just before Hurricane Harvey hit. Correspondent Maureen Maher investigates.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A mother and daughter vanish whilst out shopping. When the girl turns up dead, the mother is the initial suspect, but who really killed her?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Walter Notheis Jr was the lead singer of Bob Kugan And The In Men, who had hits in the 60s. He disappeared in 1983 and was found dead in 1987. How did he meet his maker?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a man confessed to the rape and murder of a woman at a pizza restaurant, police thought the case was closed. Until eight years later when another man confessed.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When two boys were attacked on a fishing trip, the police suspected locals thugs, but couldnt find enough evidence. Could the murky waters of the fishing hole provide proof?

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: This Is Not Show and Tell!; Smoked Out!
programme.desc: A young man claims his older, female roommate locked him out when he showed up to pick up his possessions; she says she didnt hear him. A brand-new roommate moves out after only 24 hours because he claims his landlord broke his promise not to smoke in the house.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A woman breaks a court order in order to take her child out of state, then makes terrible allegations against the childs father.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A mothers side business lands her in hot water; dog owners are told how to deal with other leashed dogs on a walk; owners of a wounded animal sue.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A woman says a handyman acted inappropriately with her daughter; he sues for defamation.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Repoed for a Crazy Amount!; Dog Grooming Business Fail
programme.desc: A car seller repossesses a vehicle over $60, the final amount owed; a woman says her ex-roommate owes her $5,000.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A woman says her intoxicated boyfriend assaulted her in Las Vegas and wants compensation for her injuries.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Elder Abuse Arrest?!; Deceased Husband ... and Boyfriend?!
programme.desc: A landlord and a tenant attack each other during an altercation; a woman sues her late boyfriends wife.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Vicious Pit Bull Attack?!; Six-Year-Old Takes the Stand!
programme.desc: Two dogs are accused of dragging their owner across the street to viciously attack another dog. A child testifies that a 55-inch TV was damaged by friends, and his mother says a mattress, carpet, and pregnancy pillow were also destroyed.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: House Flipping and Assault!?; Mechanic Fraud?!
programme.desc: A friendship comes to an end when a home renovation deal escalates into accusations of assault. Parents sue their mechanic for fraud when a car stop running.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Daddy Debt Deployed to Japan?; Show Me the Money!
programme.desc: A woman sues her estranged son-in-law for money he received for housing while out of the country. A mans failed attempt to show a $10,000 money trail of consulting fees leaves the judge with no choice but to show him the door.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Dont Clown Around With the Judge!; Car Swap Fail!
programme.desc: A father accuses his daughter of stealing after she doesnt fulfil a promise to pay him for a customised car. Plus, a teenager sues his former friend for crashing his vintage car.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Toxic Eye Injury?!; Mother Illegally Relocates Child?!
programme.desc: A woman claims she was shot in the eye with a liquid sprayer at a grocery store and is still suffering. A 9-year-old is moved to another state without his fathers permission.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Fed-Up Boss!; Negligent Teen Fishing Captain?!; Wheres My $19,000 Garage Apartment?!
programme.desc: A boss lends his employees $3000 so they wont lose their home, then they fail to pay him back. A teen is accused of driving a boat recklessly, injuring his passenger. A pair say they paid a down payment on an apartment and were left empty-handed.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Lying to Brooklyn Police?!; Uber Relationship Fail
programme.desc: A woman is accused of making outrageous statements to authorities when she tries to regain access to her illegally sublet apartment. An Uber driver befriends a passenger and sells him her car, then he misses payments.

Crossing the Fens, Michaels next stop is the cathedral city of Peterborough.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
